titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 761) to require the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture to more efficiently develop domestic sources of the minerals and mineral materials of strategic and critical importance to United States economic and national security and manufacturing competitiveness.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-214, by Mr. Bishop (UT).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 761 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 53.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 347.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 192 (Roll no. 463).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 190 (Roll no. 464).

bill.summary: 9/17/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 761) to require the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture to more efficiently develop domestic sources of the minerals and mineral materials of strategic and critical importance to United States economic and national security and manufacturing competitiveness.
